tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: While we were facing fertility issues and looking for a reliable gynecologist in Dwarka area we came across Dr. Yogita Parashar on Practo and decided to visit her. After a series of tests and treatments by her, we were able to conceive. However, our pregnancy journey was not very smooth and we faced issues like GDM, High BP, Low lying placenta, etc. but Dr. Yogita made us sail through all those rough patches smoothly. While I was in my 8th month, my BP suddenly shot to alarming levels and to our surprise, Dr. Yogita Parashar, responded on phone even in the wee hours of morning and advised us to get admitted immediately. This turned out to be the best advice at that time as in the hospital, my water broke unexpectedly and I started bleeding profusely. I had to undergo an emergency c-section and Dr. Yogita Parashar rushed to the hospital at 12 midnight on just a call. Thanks to her, today we are the happy parents of a baby boy. Had it not been for her, we even dread to think of what could have happened that night. Today we can say without an iota of doubt that Dr. Yogita is one of the best gynaecologists in Dwarka who is also a friend to the patients. It may also be added here that during lockdown, when quite a few doctors refused to see their patients, Dr. Yogita  provided consultation regularly, which was a big help for people like me who had a complicated pregnancy journey. We are really indebted to her and we highly recommend her especially for high risk pregnancies and infertility cases. Thank u so much Dr. Yogita ....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: M writing my experience with Dr. Yogita Parashar.. **** *** **** *******. she gave u the feel of doctor cum friend. I visited Manipal Hospital in 7th month of my pregnancy. I wanted normal delivery and just becoz of Yogita mam i delivered normally. she not just explain the treatment but she listen ur problems very calmly. I felt very safe with mam when we communicated first time ...I will recommend Yogita mam for everyone.. m big fan of her... m very happy tht I got doctor like u ..Thanks a lot Yogita mam without ur support n guidance..

review: I am very thankful to dr. Yogita parasar mam..who teach me that quality of life is also necessary..I had very painful period last 2 year and dignosed wd multiple uterian fibroids .Dr. Yogita mam suggest me for the mymactomy..as I said her that I am very afraid for this..she give me her concern ..and do my surgery..I never except that my fibroid surgery done very less painfull..really very very very thankful to Dr. Yogita parasar..I never forget her .thanku soooo much Mam..‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏èü•∞

review: Hi i am archana from dwarka 21 i was pregnent and a problem of sugar raise was facing while pregnent i have less chance for normal delivery although i deliver normal by help of Dr yogita parashar mam *** *** **** ********* ***** *** ********** ***** check up she is very friendly and told everything about treatment she controlled my sugar level by medicine ,diet,and exercise A very big thank to DR Yogita parashar mam and he r team i cannot forhet her ever in my life I strongly recommend to pregnents for dr yogita thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: my wife is pregnant .so I consulted with her many times.she always give positive response and advise medicine and test.she always try  to do  normal delivery. I'm very happy to take consult with her.
There were no more patients and still the doctor was in big hurry. She didn't listen completely, and could have guided better. Would not recommend.
reply_text: If a doctor is in hurry, we should be patient enough to understand that something urgent must be there.... You might not see any patient waiting outside, but there may be a mother in labour, requiring my immediate attention.... I always give enough time but if questions are solved soon, I don't think I need to drag consultation time
